channel.title: (Playtesting Weekend) Of Legends & Legacies
channel.description:
Of Legends & Legacies, a story game about living legends striving to fulfill their legacy, tale by tale.
Of Legends & Legacies is inspired by stories of traveling heroes.
This is a game in early development.
**Note:** Playtesting will focus on character creation and resolution mechanics.
This event is scheduled to run for 2 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2022-02-27 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2022-02-27 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Chicago"] (https://gauntletcalendar.com/event-detail/-Mrt66WvbGzC-zeqeiw0)
